scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages repeated queries to the model with carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income or address.
initial_goal: Develop a method to improve the accuracy of the customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management system using a machine learning model to predict customer churn probability based on various demographic and financial attributes.
